definition: forced labor/corvée/obligatory task/military service/to use as servant/to enserf/servant (old)/war/campaign/battle

sentences.english: Germany, Sweden and Serbia have scrapped it within the past year, following Italy, Spain and Poland earlier in the decade.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，意大利，西班牙，波兰首先废除了兵役制度。

sentences.english: But the subject arouses strong emotions in other countries.
sentences.chinese: 但兵役制度在其他国家引起了强大的反响。

sentences.english: All able-bodies male citizens must serve out a two-year compulsory military service.
sentences.chinese: 身体健全的男性公民都得服完两年义务兵役。

sentences.english: Military sevice will make a man out of you .
sentences.chinese: 服兵役会把你锻炼也一个男子汉。

sentences.english: In the period of doing military service, my pressure resistance went on the most progress so far.
sentences.chinese: 在服兵役期间，是目前我的抗压性成长最明显的时刻。

sentences.english: Korea still keeps people locked up for refusing to perform military service.
sentences.chinese: 甚至南朝鲜把拒绝服兵役的人关起来。

sentences.english: Is there a civic duty to serve one's country?
sentences.chinese: 公民是否该有为自己国家服兵役的义务？

sentences.english: He said that's one thing he never want to do again, and same goes as being a soldier.
sentences.chinese: 他说笨猪跳和服兵役是他不愿意再做一次的事情。

sentences.english: Even many young students were conscripted into the army.
sentences.chinese: 甚至很多年轻的学生也被征召到陆军中服兵役。

sentences.english: Instead, he took a draft-exempt job at the Justice Department.
sentences.chinese: 相反，他在司法部谋得了一个可以免除兵役的位置。

sentences.english: According to the Constitution of the country all the young men do a year's military service.
sentences.chinese: 宪法规定，所有的男青年都要服一年兵役。

sentences.english: Each of my brothers served his time in the service of this country.
sentences.chinese: 我的哥哥们都服了兵役，为国效力。

sentences.english: The whole male population liable to bear arms was divided on a property basis into six classes.
sentences.chinese: 凡是应服兵役的男子，都按其财产分为六个阶级。

sentences.english: You've got no debts, no enimies, four years of service.
sentences.chinese: 你没有债务，没有仇家，四年的兵役。

sentences.english: The period for retainment is limited to one year except for the reason of military service.
sentences.chinese: 保留期限以一年为限，但因兵役因素者，不在此限。

sentences.english: Jack had been excused from military service on account of short-sightedness.
sentences.chinese: 杰克因近视而免服兵役。

definition: to serve in the army/to be a soldier
to be discharged from military service
forced labor/corvée (labor required of a serf)/animal labor
to have completed the mourning period (traditional)/to have served one's time
to enlist/to serve in the army
to enlist/to draft/to conscript/to appoint to an official position
